desc: ALLURE STYLE ACCESSORIES HAS AN ARRAY OF BOTH ELEGANT AND SENSIBLE HAIR ACCESSORIES FOR YOU. IN ADDITION TO OUR ALLURE STYLE ACCESSORIES HAIR ACCESSORY LINE, WE ARE AN EXCLUSIVE DISTRIBUTOR OF THE LINZICLIP, AN INNOVATIVE JAW CLIP. WE ARE ALSO A LICENSEE OF FRENCH TOAST HAIR ACCESSORIES FOR GIRL’S SCHOOL UNIFORMS.

layout.text: Fashionable hair accessories to accent your style.
